snippet: Letters written by Jerry Sandusky, the former assistant football coach at Penn State who is on trial for child sex abuse, to one of the alleged victims, were a focus on the first day of testimony.
abstract: Letters written by Jerry Sandusky, the former assistant football coach at Penn State who is on trial for child sex abuse, to one of the alleged victims, were a focus on the first day of testimony.

headline.main: Letters at Center of Sandusky Trial
